summary: You don't want to wait for the crypt (back door of the Thieves Guild) to end the animation so you can enter? This mod will allow you to enter to the Thieves Guild inmediately after pressing the button on the Crypt.
descriptionHtml:
You don't want to wait for the crypt (back door of the Thieves Guild) to end the animation so you can enter? This mod will allow you to enter to the Thieves Guild inmediately after pressing the button on the Crypt.

I recommend to enable the mod and then load a game where your character is outside Riften, just to make sure everything works as expected.
author: McLion
